page.title: 14HOME LIFE IN WOLSTON 1.
page.content: Although new families make up much of Wolston population, many generations of familiar names still exist, sometimes{four generations}living as neighbours. However,{one parent {families}are on the increase and this is reflected in the number of mothers who go out to work. Most families own a car and use it at weekends to visit friends, go shopping, attend the Speedway or other sporting activities, visit local places of interest such as Museums, Combe Abbey Park, and take the family on holiday once or twice a year. Many families spend a good deal of their spare time in{watching {television}but more and more children have home computers and use these for entertainment. On warm evenings, families often go to the local public house, to the delight of the children! Fathers help with{household tasks.}
